nodes.text: The Royal Academy of Government was a New Mandalorian leadership academy that was located in the New Mandalorian capital city of Sundari on the planet Mandalore.

This building consisted of several stories and was used to groom children to become future Mandalore government officials. During the Clone Wars, the cadets Korkie (Duchess Satine's own nephew), Amis, Lagos, and Soniee studied at the Academy, and they along with Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano played a key role in exposing a black market conspiracy on Mandalore. Students at the academy were well versed in both Aurebesh and Mandalorian.
